name: highness
content:
Her/His/Your Highness
Add to word list
Add to word list
used when you are speaking to or about a royal person: [ as form of address ] Will that be all, Your Highness?

a title used when referring to an important member of a family that rules a country: His Royal Highness Prince Michael
